short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chatGPT powered AI reads the webpage you visit and displays its short summary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QiPoints Instant Summarizer, powered by ChatGPT AI, helps you quickly grasp the main points of any webpage. With just one click, our AI-powered extension provides a concise summary of the content, allowing you to save time and focus on what's important. 

The interface is only one button. Please note that the AI may occasionally hallucinate and produce inaccurate information about people, places, or facts. Always verify critical information from a reliable source

Please report directly to the author of the extension if you have any issues dealing with it
